page.title: 15WOODLANDS FARM
page.content: The present owner of{Woodlands Farm has lived there for{just over}a{year, and own around{twenty five acres}of land,which is used for{hay}and {grazing.}The busiest time of the year is{May}and{June,}lambing time.When old enough,the{rams}are sent to{market.}To {utilate}the{grassland}which is not used for{hay,}the{sheep}and a{couple of{horses}graze on it. They also have a few{ducks}and{hens}which produce {eggs}and{meat.}They employ{one person who helps at the weekends.They buy the corn from{local dealers.}Altogether they have{44 animals.
